attributes.action: give out an official  parents medal for those that have lost  children in war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask that parents are recognised by the goverment as people that have lost children in war /conflict and issue them a medal that can be worn on rememberance day ,  rememberance sunday , or any medal wearing event ,a medal to be worn  by   parents  that  are not next of kin . as parents not next of kin have no recogition ,no  medal nothing to show they have lost a special person in their family a son /daughter in war /conflict situations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to give out an official parents medal for those that have lost children in war.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=theparentmedal


Her Majesty's Government
